trans-unit.source: Contains advanced properties for key creation.
trans-unit.target: 包含建立金鑰的進階屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> objects contain properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> 物件包含的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Some properties must be added to a key when it is created.
trans-unit.target: 某些屬性必須在建立時新增至索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Other properties can be added after the key is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立金鑰之後，可以加入其他屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters> class enables you to add properties to a key as it is being created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters>類別可讓您正在建立時，將屬性加入至索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: You can do this by passing a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters> object that contains standard key properties, such as key storage provider (KSP), export policy, key usage, user interface (UI) policy, and parent window handle, to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Create%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由傳遞<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters>物件，包含標準的索引鍵屬性，例如金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP)、 匯出原則、 金鑰使用方式、 使用者介面 (UI) 原則，以及父視窗控制代碼，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Create%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object that is being created will be initialized with these values before it is finalized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>正在建立將會以這些值初始化之前結束，也就是物件。

trans-unit.source: You can also add non-standard properties to a key by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters.Parameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以加入至索引鍵非標準的屬性，使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters.Parameters%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you need to add properties after a key is created, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.SetProperty%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要加入屬性之後建立金鑰，請使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.SetProperty%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key export policy.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定金鑰匯出原則。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies a key export policy.
trans-unit.target: 指定金鑰匯出原則的物件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that the key storage provider's default export policy is set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />，會指出已設定金鑰儲存提供者的預設匯出原則。

trans-unit.source: For information about key export policies, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngExportPolicies> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需金鑰匯出原則的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngExportPolicies>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key creation options.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定金鑰建立選項。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies options for creating keys.
trans-unit.target: 指定建立金鑰之選項的物件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that the key storage provider's default key creation options are set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />，會指出已設定金鑰儲存提供者的預設金鑰建立選項。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationOptions> object defines options that are used when you create a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationOptions>物件會定義選項，當您建立新的可用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: These options determine whether the key is created in the user or machine key store, and whether a new key should overwrite an existing key.
trans-unit.target: 這些選項會決定是否在使用者或電腦金鑰存放區，建立金鑰和新的金鑰是否應該覆寫現有的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: By default, if <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationOptions.MachineKey?displayProperty=nameWithType> is not specified, the key is created in the user store.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，如果<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationOptions.MachineKey?displayProperty=nameWithType>未指定，在使用者存放區中建立金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cryptographic operations that apply to the current key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定套用至目前金鑰的密碼編譯作業。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of one or more enumeration values that specify key usage.
trans-unit.target: 一個或多個列舉值的位元組合，指定金鑰的使用方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />, which indicates that the key storage provider's default key usage is set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />，會指出已設定金鑰儲存提供者的預設金鑰使用方式。

trans-unit.source: This property is used when you create a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性可在您建立新<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the usages (such as encryption/decryption, signing/verification, and secret agreement generation) that will be enabled on the new key.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定新的金鑰上將啟用的使用方式 （例如加密/解密、 簽章/驗證和產生密碼協議）。

trans-unit.source: Enables a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey" /> object to be created with additional properties that are set before the key is finalized.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey" /> 物件，該物件會以金鑰做最終處理之前設定的額外屬性建立。

trans-unit.source: A collection object that contains any additional parameters that you must set on a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey" /> object during key creation.
trans-unit.target: 集合物件，包含建立金鑰時，必須在 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey" /> 物件上設定的任何額外參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters> class enables you to create a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey> object and initialize it with common properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters>類別可讓您建立新<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey>物件，並初始化與通用屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you must set additional properties on the key during its creation, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: 如果您必須在其建立期間，將金鑰上設定其他屬性，請遵循下列步驟：

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty> object for each additional property that you must set.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty>必須設定每個其他屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters.Parameters%2A> property to obtain an empty <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngPropertyCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters.Parameters%2A>屬性，以取得空<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngPropertyCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty> objects to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngPropertyCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngProperty>物件加入至<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngPropertyCollection>物件。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Create%28System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters%29> method overload and pass the initialized <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters> object to it.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKey.Create%28System.Security.Cryptography.CngAlgorithm%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters%29>方法多載，也會傳遞初始化<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters>物件傳送給它。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the window handle that should be used as the parent window for dialog boxes that are created by Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) classes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定視窗控制代碼，該代碼應用來做為 Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) 類別所建立對話方塊的父視窗。

trans-unit.source: The HWND of the parent window that is used for CNG dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: 父視窗的 HWND，用於 CNG 對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: This property should be set if key creation causes CNG to show a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 如果金鑰建立造成 CNG 顯示一個對話方塊，則應該設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key storage provider (KSP) to create a key in.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP)，以便於其中建立金鑰。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the KSP that a new key will be created in.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定要在其中建立新金鑰的 KSP。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters.Provider" /> property is set to a <see langword="null" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.CngKeyCreationParameters.Provider" /> 屬性會設定為 <see langword="null" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets information about the user interface to display when a key is created or accessed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者介面的相關資訊，以便在建立或存取金鑰時顯示。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains details about the user interface shown by Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) classes when a key is created or accessed.
trans-unit.target: 包含使用者介面相關資訊的物件，會在建立或存取金鑰時由 Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) 類別顯示。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="null" /> value indicates that the key storage provider's default user interface policy is set.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" /> 值，表示已設定金鑰儲存提供者的預設使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
